thread.title: BRIEF-Public Service Enterprise Group Reports Qtrly Non-GAAP Operating Earnings Of $0.97 Per Share

title: BRIEF-Public Service Enterprise Group Reports Qtrly Non-GAAP Operating Earnings Of $0.97 Per Share

organizations.name: share  public service enterprise group reports qtrly
min read  public service enterprise group inc

text:
April 30, 2018 / 12:00 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Public Service Enterprise Group Reports Qtrly Non-GAAP Operating Earnings Of $0.97 Per Share Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Public Service Enterprise Group Inc :
* REPORTS $1.10 PER SHARE OF QTRLY NET INCOME, QTRLY NON-GAAP OPERATING EARNINGS OF $0.97 PER SHARE
* PUBLIC SERVICE ENTERPRISE GROUP - CONTINUES TO FOCUS ON STRATEGIC INVESTMENT PROGRAM OF $13 BILLION TO $15 BILLION OVER 2018 TO 2022 PERIOD
* RE-AFFIRMING NON-GAAP OPERATING EARNINGS GUIDANCE FOR 2018 OF $3.00 - $3.20 PER SHARE
* QTRLY OPERATING REVENUES $2,818 MILLION VERSUS $2,591 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.99, REVENUE VIEW $2.91 BILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.12 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text: [ bit.ly/2HDmSnw ] Further company coverage:
